name: サルゲッチュ2
summary:
Ape Escape 2, known as Saru! Get You! 2 (サルゲッチュ2 Saru Getchu 2) in Japan, is a platform video game developed and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation 2 video game console. It is the second game in the Ape Escape series, and is also used as the basis for the cartoon series by Frederator.
The game was made available for download on the PlayStation 4 in 2016, which added trophy support.
